vr_mode_category.strategy_tip: Combine the research done by your scientists with your neural network. Don't have any scientists? Consider hiring some.

vr_mode_category.description: Make changes to the simulated world your human patrons experience.
vr_mode_category.strategy_tip: Applies to those in day-use seats and full-time full-dive VR pods.

vr_mode_category.description: Make changes to the experience of humans you've placed into torment vessels.
Mentally overload patrons of either your virtual world or torment vessels.
vr_mode_category.strategy_tip: You can gain a temporary boost if you need one from doing this, but there will be deaths, and they will be considered murders.
